moreBlocks.articles:
• Practice Areas
    From its inception 1987, the attorneys at Franklin D. Azar & Associates, P.C. have provided aggressive and effective legal representation for Colorado area residents in cases involving personal injuries.areas
  • Denver Auto Accident Lawyer
    Unfortunately, driving or riding in a car can have dangerous results.
  • Denver Motorcycle Accident Attorney
    As with any type of vehicle accident, motorcycle accidents can cause serious injuries in an instant.
  • Denver Bad Faith Insurance Attorney
    It is required by law that your insurance company conducts business with you in good faith whenever a claim is submitted for you or against you.
  • Denver Bus Accident Attorney
    Our Denver Auto Accident Attorneys are acutely aware that bus accidents are a particular concern for the thousands of students that travel to school each day by school bus.

description:
Let Our 'Strong Arm' Do The Heavy Lifting For You

Franklin D. Azar & Associates, P.C., in Pueblo, Colorado, is a personal injury law firm that lets nothing stand in the way between its clients and the compensation due to them.

Our founding attorney, Frank Azar, is known as "The Strong Arm" of Colorado personal injury law. He and our team of tenacious personal injury litigators have represented thousands of injured plaintiffs in lawsuits against negligent and liable parties.

Depending on the nature, severity and duration of your injuries, we can obtain financial compensation, medical treatment and monthly benefits you need for your injuries. Always, we will fight to get our clients the maximum compensation for which they are eligible.

Cases in which our tenacious legal team provides representation include:

  • Serious personal injury accidents
  • Workers' compensation
  • Social Security Disability (SSD)
  • Wrongful death lawsuits
  • Class-action lawsuits

More things you should know about Franklin D. Azar & Associates, P.C.:

  • We offer free, no-obligation consultations to our prospective clients.
  • We take calls 24/7.
  • We do not charge attorney fees unless we recover compensation for our clients.
  • We speak Spanish and welcome Spanish-speaking clients. Se habla español.
  • We can help you win!

Franklin D. Azar & Associates, P.C., maintains offices in Pueblo, Colorado Springs, Aurora and Trinidad, Colorado. Contact us today for a free case evaluation with a lawyer.
